description: This source file defines a factory function for creating a Simple Client UDP object in the ANSC framework. It includes licensing information, module description, environment, author, revision history, necessary includes, and the implementation of the creation function 'AnscCreateSimpleClientUdp'.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscCreateSimpleClientUdp(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and returns a new Simple Client UDP object handle by calling the underlying factory function 'AnscScuoCreate'.
